feed.title: Pleura and Peritoneum
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Pleura and Peritoneum

entry.title: Patient-specific 3D-tissue slices from peritoneal metastases – Anin vitromodel for individual susceptibility analysis
entry.summary: Article by Christian Etzold, Orestis Lyros, Matthias Mehdorn, Robert Nowotny, Stefan Niebisch, Boris Jansen-Winkeln, Katrin Schierle, Ines Gockel, René Thieme DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/pp-2024-0012

entry.title: Imaging gastric cancer metastasis progression in an organotypic, three-dimensional functional model of the human peritoneum
entry.summary: Article by Arianna Castagna, Frank-Jürgen Weinreich, Andreas Brandl, Janine Spreuer, Nicola Herold, Birgit Schittek, Marc André Reymond, Wiebke Solass DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/pp-2024-0020

entry.title: Can inter-observer consistency be achieved in the laparoscopic assessment of the peritoneal carcinomatosis index score in peritoneal metastasis? A pilot study
entry.summary: Article by Audrey Astruc, Valérie Seegers, Frederic Dumont, Cécile Loaec, Emilie Thibaudeau, Charlotte Bourgin, Romuald Wernert, Noémie Body, Valeria De Franco DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/pp-2024-0015

entry.title: Pressurised intraperitoneal aerosol chemotherapy (PIPAC): the first Australian experience
entry.summary: Article by Katarina Foley, Jessica Reid, Suzanne Edwards, Timothy Price, Allan Zimet, Susan Woods, Markus Trochsler, Andrew Craig Lynch, Peter Hewett DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/pp-2024-0028

entry.title: Peritoneal melanomatosis due to primary anorectal melanoma
entry.summary: Article by Aras Emre Canda, Semra Demirli Atici, Evren Kadioglu, Cem Terzi DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/pp-2025-0002
